survey_name: Healthcare Provider Satisfaction with AI-Assisted Diagnostics Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate healthcare providers' satisfaction and experiences with AI-assisted diagnostic tools, focusing on usability, accuracy, and impact on workflow.

questions.question_text: What is your primary role in healthcare?
questions.client_notes: Ensure 'Other' includes an open-text field for specification. This helps segment responses by role.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is your primary role in healthcare?

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-assisted diagnostic tools in your practice?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for frequency. Helps gauge adoption rates.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-assisted diagnostic tools in your practice?

questions.question_text: Which of the following AI-assisted diagnostic tools have you used? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Natural language processing for patient records
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Rarely' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice to capture diverse tool usage. Include 'Other' for completeness.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following AI-assisted diagnostic tools have you used? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Natural language processing for patient records
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Rarely' in Q2

questions.question_text: How would you rate the accuracy of AI-assisted diagnostic tools in your experience?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Rarely' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Likert scale for accuracy perception. Critical for understanding trust in AI tools.

questions.client_notes: Multi-choice to identify common pain points. 'Other' captures unique challenges.
